title: Google Shopping’s ‘monopoly-like’ position leads to a new $2.4 billion lawsuit in the EU
content:
Google has been facing a lot of scrutiny over the past few years over its dominant positions in the market, and this week the company is facing yet another lawsuit. In the EU, a competitor to Google Shopping has issued a multi-billion dollar lawsuit over Search favoring Google Shopping over competitors.

more…

The post Google Shopping’s ‘monopoly-like’ position leads to a new $2.4 billion lawsuit in the EU appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: EU-based company PriceRunner has hit Google with a €2.1 billion lawsuit that seeks damages for the "monopoly-like" position of Google Shopping
